name: Michael Barnathan
overview: Michael Barnathan is currently Head of Mobile at 8coupons, through the acquisition of Clipless, where he was the sole founder. Michael has previously founded Living Discoveries and Project Polymath, with the aims of improving medicine and education. Michael has a PhD in Computer and Information Sciences, specifically machine learning applied to medical diagnosis, and is a former Senior Software Engineer at Google and CTO of CoatChex.
